CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Red", TODAY()- LastActivityDate < 60), "Quality of Relationship is Red", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Red", TEXT(LastActivityDate) =""), "No Activity", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Red", TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 60), "Quality of Relationship is Red and Activity > 60 Days", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Amber", TODAY()- LastActivityDate < 60), "Quality of Relationship is Amber", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Amber", TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 60), "Quality of Relationship is Amber and Activity > 60 Days", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Amber", TEXT(LastActivityDate) =""), "Quality of Relationship is Amber and No Activity", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Green", TODAY()- LastActivityDate < 60), "All Criteria Met", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Green", TODAY()- LastActivityDate > 60), "Activity >60 Days", IF(AND(TEXT(Quality_of_Relationship__c) = "Green", TEXT(LastActivityDate) =""), "No Activity", "No Status")))))))))
CustomField.label: Account Relationship Reason
